hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export BASE_LOG_PATH="" export CONSOLE_LOG_LEVEL=10 export LOG_PATH="" export NEXUS_INTF_NUM="" export NEXUS_IP=192.168.254.10 export NEXUS_PASSWORD=Cisco12345 export NEXUS_USER=admin export NEXUS_VLAN_END=3100 export NEXUS_VLAN_START=3000 export NODE_DEFAULT_ETH=eth0 export OFFLINE_NODE_WHEN_COMPLETE="" export OS_AUTH_URL="" export OS_DNS="" export OS_FLAVOR_NAME=devstack.medium export OS_IMAGE_NAME=devstack-trusty-\d+.template.openstack.org export OS_PASSWORD="" export OS_TENANT_NAME="" export OS_USERNAME="" export WORKSPACE=~/workspace/internal_ml2_multinode export ZUUL_BRANCH="" export ZUUL_CHANGE="" export ZUUL_CHANGES="" export ZUUL_CHANGE_IDS="" export ZUUL_COMMIT="" export ZUUL_PATCHSET="" export ZUUL_PIPELINE="" export ZUUL_PROJECT="" export ZUUL_REF="staging" export ZUUL_URL="https://github.com/cisco-openstack/neutron.git" export ZUUL_UUID=No
wget http://172.29.173.233/devstack.multinode/devstack-trusty.template.openstack.org.qcow wget http://172.29.173.233/devstack.multinode/id_rsa wget http://172.29.173.233/devstack.multinode/titanium.qcow
cd neutron_ci
# Update specific Nova repo. sed -i '72 i NOVA_REPO=https://github.com/cisco-openstack/nova.git' ci/tests/test_multinode.py sed -i '72 i NOVA_BRANCH=staging' ci/tests/test_multinode.py sed -i '21 i NOVA_REPO=https://github.com/cisco-openstack/nova.git' ci/tests/test_multinode.py sed -i '21 i NOVA_BRANCH=staging' ci/tests/test_multinode.py
sudo apt-get install -y libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev zlib1g-dev sshpass mysql-client libmysqlclient-dev python-subunit # FIXME: Avoid using run.sh, cause creation of archive with logs are starting today ./run.sh ci/tests/test_multinode.py sudo pip install -r requirements.txt timeout --preserve-status --signal=2 3600 nosetests ci/tests/test_multinode.py
